thread.section_title: SelectQuote Senior Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelectQuote Senior | selectquotesenior.com
thread.title: PATRICIA A
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Senior reviewed by PATRICIA A

author: PATRICIA A
title: PATRICIA A
text:
Medicare is so vastly confusing to me, I ALWAYS call Select Quote: when I need to get things straight. In fact, I used Select Quote: years ago to find life insurance.
My question is: Why don't people use Select Quote: more often? They don't "belong" to anyone so they can do the right thing by steering the hapless caller to the best possible solution. They are unfailingly polite, patient and, thank goodness, have a sense of humor.
PEOPLE, it's a MINEFIELD out there! Get some help making these important healthcare decisions. And, thankfully, you can always call the good folks at Select Quote: and shop around for something better.
For some reason, Blue Cross and Blue Shield aren't part of Select Quote: .
Keep up the great work, guys and gals!!
And MANY THANKS.
THUMBS UP üëç and FIVE STARS.
